details:
verb
- to perform a musical accompaniment
= example: to perform a musical accompaniment
= synonyms: follow
- to go or travel along with
= example: to go or travel along with
- to be present or associated with an event or entity
= example: to be present or associated with an event or entity
= synonyms: attach to, go with, come with
- to be a companion to somebody
= example: to be a companion to somebody
= synonyms: company
